questions.question: What is the primary function of an RC isolated footing?

answers.a: To transfer loads from columns to soil safely
answers.b: To provide aesthetic appeal to the structure
answers.d: To act as a waterproofing layer

questions.question: Which factor is most critical when designing an isolated footing?
What type of reinforcement is commonly used in an RC isolated footing?

answers.c: A combination of main bars and distribution bars

questions.question: Which structural failure can occur if the footing is under-designed?
What is the standard assumption in the design of an RC isolated footing?

answers.c: Concrete takes tension and compression equally
answers.d: Footings are independent of column load
